channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
channel.description:
Kidnapper - Neutral Special
Passive - Night immune once
Day ability - Jail your target. If the Prince selects the same person your jail will fail. If you jail the Prince his jail will fail. If he jails you your jail will fail. If you both jail each other then your jail will fail. (Otherwise jail works just like the Prince's
Night ability 1 (Execute): Execute your prisoner - 3
Night ability 2 (Royal Mask): Have your jail chat appear as Prince for the rest of the night (normally says kidnapper) - infinite
Goal. Survive and have the BD lose

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I know. The whole point is that he wants to. Otherwise why should he care about your class

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: Strangle
item.description:
Because he has the power to execute blue dragon any time he wants.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Why? He is supposed to be scum trying to find other scum. How does a survivor goal help this class work?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: Strangle
item.description:
I feel like you need to change the goal to just Survive.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
All of these facts are known and intended. The fact that you can to a Kidnapper check means it won’t effect games it’s not in. The princesses means he can be found to not be Prince and the first thing you mentioned means that you need to go into each jail with atleast some kind of plan.

In other words you are completely right and this is fine.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: Insert_Cancer_Here
item.description:
I see, but the fact is that you have to be very quick and efficient with your button pressing because otherwise they’ll probably see you as evil. Also people can Kidnapper check on d2 to confirm that there is actually a Kidnapper in the game. (Also princess will see Kidnapper as Special/Investigative so you’ll probably be outed right away. Making the class Killer allows more flexibility). I’m just saying that this role is a VERY difficult role to play.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
While this class would make a great NK with a bit of tweaking (same with a survivor goal) I made this class with a goal in mind: putting pressure or the Prince and giving BD prisoners a reason to seem scum. The goal I gave is the only one that works to fulfill this purpose

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: Insert_Cancer_Here
item.description:
I’m just looking through this role suggestion, and I do think that this class should be a NK and have an NK goal. This role is a very good one but it will be very difficult to claim and once Prince dies everyone knows theres a Kidnapper. Honestly make it so that you just survive, helping whichever side you think will win.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Ami:

Was there a CL? If there was the Converter was there. I said I combined the two class because they serve somewhat of the same purpose.

My point is there is no need to bind yourself to arbitrary constrictions such as specials having to spawn

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

I have played many a game without master mind.

Was there a CL? If there was the Converter was there. I said I combined the two class because they serve somewhat of the same purpose.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
MM doesn’t spawn every game.

CL doesn’t spawn every game.

A converter does spawn every game, yes.

That’s all I have to say. I have played many a game without master mind.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
It’d be negative in the respect of BD arguing with Prince in jail over not revealing info or their class and getting executed for it. Flame wars would ensue.

So the Kidnapper has to use his night ability to have himself appear as Prince, but if he does so he can’t execute…

So the meta shifts into “If Prince talks first, he’s probably Prince.”
Even with this new routine, important BD players (or self-important ones lol) will refuse to give their class in case the Prince is actually a Kidnapper that will execute them the next night.

BD is fairly strong right now, but even so its win rate would plummet with the huge rise of mis-executions and lack of trust with BD’s most powerful role. The Kidnapper is one of those classes that can hugely influence the game even if he doesn’t spawn in said game.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Remember the fact that a Kidnapper cannot appear as Prince and Kill you on the same night. This means that if in jail you see the prince chat then you cannot be killed by the Kidnapper (the Prince however…).

Also who said that the change is negative?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
I think the Kidnapper will affect the meta in a negative way.

Even if a Kidnapper doesn’t spawn in a given game, it causes BD to give false information or refuse to give their class to the real Prince under suspicion of him being a Kidnapper. This will allow scum to have a reason not to claim to the Prince or to lie about information.

I’m not sure the Kidnapper role is interesting enough to add any dynamic change to the game in its current state.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
Ashe:

A Special/Investigative result is basically left alone because it’s very bad to out an investigative early on,

  1. The mere fact that the Princess is finding this result should cause suspicion – the Princess herself is an Investigative role, reducing the “investigative slot potential” meaning your target is slightly more likely to be a Special class.

  2. Outing an investigative is worth the risk for possibly eliminating the scum leader. If you currently don’t take this risk, you should in the future.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
Hmm lets take a look at the three special roles.

KING: always shows up, no matter what

MM: Shows up with Unseen (Same with CL except shows up with cult) So for reasons to prove my point I’m going to combine them into the Converters (NOT SUGGESTING A CLASS WITH THIS) There for, every game 2 specials will always show up

RopeStringFace:

A special role is not guaranteed to show up

Thus, making this statement wrong.

I don’t like this class due to it really being a Neutral Prince. There should be only one person that can jail and that should be the prince.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Why not? What’s wrong with special?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
A special role is not guaranteed to show up.

That being said, don’t use special for this class.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Evil isn’t an alignment. Offensive could work but I still like special the best

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
1. It was basically a flavor text thing, it doesn’t affect mechanics at all though
  2. Okay.
  3. Because Prince is killer. If you don’t want it to be a ‘killer’ persay, make it neutral offensive, or neut evil, given that the goal is a standard neut evil goal.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
It could probably use it, but I think if you add that make executes at 3 to counterbalance.

Read full topic

op

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Would you like me to add one time night immunity? (Serious question)

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
The thing with classes like ToS Witch is they need to be extremely powerful and have a method of not random dying due to not knowing your allies to have a chance at success. I could see Unseen/Cult just by chance alone killing this class in the first few nights before you even get a chance to find any allies, so it’d come down to almost pure luck alone whether you won or not.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Kidnapper (Neutral Special)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
That’s an unpopular opinion believe it or not. Roles like ToS Witch are incredibly popular and fun to play. Since you are evil but other evils don’t know you it means you first need to find your Ally’s. These roles tend to be more powerful than the average evil (other than NK) and this the evils REALLY want to find them ASAP.

Read full topic
